title: Cloverfield & Bartelme Logos
content:
Hi there, was wondering if anyone can help with these two?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Cloverfield](http://web.archive.org/web/20080124104310/http:/typophile.com/files/Screenshot%202.png) | 24.61 KB |
| [Bartelme](http://web.archive.org/web/20080124104310/http:/typophile.com/files/Screenshot%201.png) | 10.33 KB |

 [‹ script - delightfully still !](http://web.archive.org/web/20080124104310/http:/typophile.com/node/41205 "Go to previous forum topic") [Focus Cover fonts ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080124104310/http:/typophile.com/node/41156 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Joshua

comments.content: Cloverfield looks like [Klampenborg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080124104310/http:/www.type.co.uk/index.php?p=a_to_z&let=*&id=11242) by Christian Küsters in a heavier version. Bartelme has a backslanted Myriad Italic feel …

The Cloverfield movie logo was identified in [this previous thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20080124104310/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39668). [Search](http://web.archive.org/web/20080124104310/http:/www.google.com/search?q=site:typophile.com%20cloverfield) is your friend. ;^)
